text: Need Hayden Howard for Myer campaign. Budget around $4,173, looking for 3 x Pinterest pin, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram post, 3 x Behind-the-scenes content, 3 x 60-second YouTube video. 9 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
